Makeup Artist

Greetings to everyone who comes across my portfolio! My name is Jasmin Zayas and I'm a certified makeup artist in New Jersey. My skill set includes bridal/wedding makeup, editorial makeup, photoshoot makeup, fashion and runway makeup, special occasion makeup, night out glam, etc. If you are interested in booking with me please feel free to email me or inquire on instagram.
